name: Long Parameter List
description: Detects methods with too many parameters, which makes them difficult to understand, call correctly, and maintain. Consider using parameter objects or builder patterns.

examples.before: public Order createOrder(String customerId, String productId, int quantity, double price, String address, String city, String zipCode, String country, boolean express) {}
examples.after: public Order createOrder(Customer customer, Product product, ShippingAddress address, OrderOptions options) {}
